long_description: Travel the world in style with the comfortable REI Sausalito shirt. It's your go-to top when you want to look sharp and feel great while on the go. Woven modal/polyester blend dries quickly to keep you comfortable while traveling; fabric also resists wrinkles and offers a soft hand and natural drape. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Chest pocket stashes essentials. Relaxed fit provides easy movement that maximizes comfort without compromising your look. The REI Sausalito shirt has a straight hem with side splits that looks great left untucked.
